pullrequest.title: Ogre2: Fix shadows by dynamically generating shadow maps

content.raw: There is an impact on resource usage. I found that in the previous approach of using statically defined shadow texture, all those textures were created on startup even if they are not used. So for the typical use case outside of subt, it’s a waste. The new approach recreates these resources whenever the number of shadow casting light changes but the downside of this approach is that all these resources needs to be destroyed and recreated so there is a performance impact when a new shadow-casting light is added or removed. I have yet to find a way to avoid this.
